subject: Re: [junit] News, changes, and stuff
msgSnippet: ... I ll be at XPU (XPAU?), as well. The BOF sounds very good. J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger President, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com
messageBody:
Quoting geektank <emeade@...>:

> I'm going to be attending XP Agile Universe.
> http://xpuniverse.com/home I'll be giving a tutorial with a coworker
> on A Introduction to Test Driven Design. I was wondering if anyone
> would be interested in a JUnit Birds of a Feather meeting?

I'll be at XPU (XPAU?), as well. The BOF sounds very good.

J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
President, Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Let's write software that people understand.
